monogr.title: Here foloweth dyuers holy instrucyons and teachynges : very necessarye for the helth of mannes soule, newly made and set forth by a late brother of Syon Rychard whitforde
monogr.author: Whitford, Richard

div.head: ¶ Vnto the deuout reders.
div.p: HEre be many good and profetable lessōs ascribed vnto saynt Isodor whiche maye be rather called & taken for notes gadred, then for any worke digested and ordered, yf you rede thē and note them well (you shal I doubt not) be edified therby. A deuout brother of ours instantly requirynge: forsed me to stranslate the mater, which I haue done, more after the sens and meanyng of the auctour: then after the letter, and somewhere I haue added vnto the auctour, rather than mynushed any thynge. Ascribe, and take all vnto the beste I byseche you, good deuoute Christiane reders whom our lorde god, & moste swete sauiour Iesu, saue kepe, & increace in his grace and mercy euermore. Amen. Your assured bedeman the olde wreched brother of Syon Rycherd Whytforde.
